name: RAZE RIOT
description:
RAZE HELL, LEVEL HEAVEN

Raze Riot is a PvP cardgame inspired by the killer style and lightning action of anime fighters like Guilty Gear and Melty Blood. Players take on the role of mascot characters from fighting game franchises that never were, battling it out for the fate of their worlds—that is, who's going to get a sequel with rollback first.

This version of the game is a public beta test, intended to stress-test fundamental aspects of the game like the core engine, deck sizes and ratios. It contains everything you need to play the game, including the rulebook and two decks in both Print and Play and TTS form, so you're ready to rock whether offline or on.

EDIT: There's now a downloadable version of the TTS mod for your enjoyment at https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2932030944. It's not pretty, but it'll do.
